title: MedHE: Communication-Efficient Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning with Adaptive Gradient Sparsification for Healthcare
summary: Healthcare federated learning requires strong privacy guarantees while maintaining computational efficiency across resource-constrained medical institutions. This paper presents MedHE, a novel framework combining adaptive gradient sparsification with CKKS homomorphic encryption to enable privacy-preserving collaborative learning on sensitive medical data.
